DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the participant temporarily stopped smoking

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Temporary (One Year or Longer) Discontinuation of cigarette smoking, to occur between the age the participant began smoking and the age the participant permanently quit smoking cigarettes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
